Ward {2} [i](Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)[/i]
Whenever Runspau, the Seer or another Human enters under your control, look at the top three cards of your library, reveal a land card from among them, put it into your hand, then put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
